channel.title: Webclient doesnt work "Can't find the main class: client." [PI]
channel.description: well i have made a webclient with jarmaker. i jarred it and signed it. when i start the .jar file (webclient) it comes up with an error saying "can't find the main class: client" and when i uploaded it to dropbox and then to my website the java loads but then an error comes up and the screen is white. ive tried other clients. and doesnt work either. please help i am trying to improve my server and making a webclient so more players will join. thanks, bye

item.title: Webclient doesnt work "Can't find the main class: client." [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

While jarring make sure you manifest the gui(if your using pi anyways). Its saying it can’t find the class its looking for which means it cannot run it which means your webclient wont work. I used to have this problem too, I’m not sure if its a flaw with the .jar maker cause I kept redoing until it worked doing the exact same thing.

Read full topic
item.source: Webclient doesnt work "Can't find the main class: client." [PI]

item.title: Webclient doesnt work "Can't find the main class: client." [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Leoiscool Leoiscool
item.description:
@Leoiscool wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

Make sure you compiled with jdk6

i have JDK 7…

EDIT: i downloaded jdk 6 update 25. i made the webclient once again. now it wont even open. it doesnt even pop up a message. and i tried uploading it to my website same error after i loaded java
